page.title: 07FIRE SERVICE: FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: Fenny compton has a part time {FIRE {SERVICE }& all the firemen have other jobs & are called to the Fire Station by means of a radio bleeper. In just two minutes, the six men have put on their heavy coats with shiny buttons, a pair of rubber boots with metal toe caps, yellow waterproof trousers & a fibreglass helmet. A computer prints out their venue,& the type of incident & the engine races out with siren blaring & lights flashing.The pump carries some water, but this is not used if there is a Hydrant nearby.It can pump 750 gallons a water each minute. They carry foam to smother chemical fires, rescue lines & powerful cutters. They spend much time going to road accidents, and save many lives by cutting people from vehicles involved in road accidents.
